metadata.synopsis: The firewizard talks to himself and his elementals during his idle.
metadata.how_to_trigger: load up CTY_Main_Ateleport to -86; 19; 842observe the firewizard form a dianstance as he is talking to himslef (location: -117; 22; 836)

0.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
0.text: Sarin's soul will not be slave to any god - Absolute or otherwise!
0.context: NodeContext: As if soothing a sensitive child

1.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
1.text: Hush, Cousin. Of course you're my favourite. But I made the others from your mass - so they are my favourite too.
1.context: NodeContext: As if soothing a sensitive child

2.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
2.text: QUIET, COUSINS! We will show Sarin proper respect.
2.context: NodeContext: Rage-filled shout at first, contrasting with quiet reasonable tone on second sentence.
